channel.title: 3 items kept
channel.description:
All I need is a void made for this.
I am using: megascape source Open client.java search for oh dear. You will find something that says removeallitems. Can someone edit this for me so that 3 items are kept when you die. Duping is kind of getting out of hand...

item.title: 3 items kept
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

just get it so you dont drop any? do this by deleting the removeallitems() or whatever.

Read full topic
